relation: Beth Berret (Society for Human Resource Management)
Taste of the Sciences & Real Girls Do STEM (Science Association)
textBeforeTable: Each year, the Student Government Association awards the Club of the Year and the Advisor of the Year at the annual Awards and Inductions at the end of the Spring semester.  The Club of the Year is recognized for their contributions to the Alvernia community, their participation in campus events and activities their club has organized on their own.  The Advisor of the Year is nominated by a member of SGA to honor their dedication to their club, their students and Alvernia.
